description: The American fast-food giant sold its 840 stores to a Siberian oil mogul after pulling out from Russia this spring to protest President Vladimir V. Putin’s invasion of Ukraine.
title: McDonald’s Reopens in Russia Under New Ownership
title_page: McDonald’s Reopens in Russia Under New Ownership - The New York Times
